regen.new_specification: The system shall deliver non-critical alarm notifications to the operator's workstation within a reasonable timeframe, as defined in the database.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling database limit errors when maximum number of users is reached
regen.new_specification: The system shall display an error message to the user attempting to log in when the maximum number of users defined in the database has been reached.

regen.absent_element: adjustable facility map refresh rate via database
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow for adjustment of the facility map refresh rate via the database.

label: Refreshrate of the facility map can be configurable within the database to more than 2 seconds by the user.
absence: action of modifying refresh rate within the database
